Compact a gt table

tab_compact.Rd

Compact a gt table. Uses tab_options to set table.font.size and the various padding options (see Details).

Usage

tab_compact(x, font.size = 13, padding = 1)

tab_padding(x, padding)

Arguments

x

the table to compact.

font.size

the desired font size.

padding

spacing between rows, in pixels.

Details

Padding options that are set are data_row.padding, summary_row.padding, grand_summary_row.padding, footnotes.padding, source_notes.padding, and row_group.padding; all are set to the same value.
